question: How is transcriptional elongation affected by nucleosome positioning?
ideal_answer: In order to elongate their products, both DNA and RNA polymerases must be able to overcome the inhibition presented by chromatin. Nucleosome arrays inhibit both initiation and elongation of transcripts.
